sentences.english: Sugar and vinegar are seasonings of this sparerib soup.
sentences.chinese: 糖和醋是做这道排骨汤的辅料。

sentences.english: Method The technique of direct powder compression was adopted using compressible starch as the main excipient .
sentences.chinese: 方法采用可压性淀粉为主辅料，粉末直接压片。

sentences.english: A capillary GC method was established for determination of cetyl alcohol and stearyl alcohol in cetostearyl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 建立了毛细管GC法测定药用辅料十六十八醇的含量。

sentences.english: Familiar with guangzhou the large market, has the rich textiles face quotient resources.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉广州中大的面辅料市场，有丰富的面辅料商资源。

sentences.english: Familiar with guangzhou the large market, has the rich textiles face quotient resources.
sentences.chinese: 熟悉广州中大的面辅料市场，有丰富的面辅料商资源。

sentences.english: Secondly, saccharification process adding enzyme agent of extruded rice as beer adjunct was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了挤压膨化大米为辅料生产啤酒的加酶糖化工艺。

sentences.english: This general chapter applies to existing drug substances, excipients, and products.
sentences.chinese: 该公例实用于现有的主药，辅料和成品。

sentences.english: Poloxamer 407 is used widely in the field of medicine as one kind of adjuvants.
sentences.chinese: 泊洛沙姆407是医药领域应用非常广泛的一种辅料。

sentences.english: The injections and nonprescription pharmaceuticals shall, in addition, list the names of all supplementary materials in use.
sentences.chinese: 注射剂和非处方药还应当列出所用的全部辅料名称。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the effect on body pharmacokinetics of chitin as tablet additive.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究甲壳胺作为片剂辅料对人体药动学的影响。

sentences.english: After the operation, regular dry pin site dressings are applied until wound healing.
sentences.chinese: 术后入钉部位辅料包盖，保持干燥直至伤口愈合。

sentences.english: ResultsThe optimization assistance materials are the sugar and dextrin.
sentences.chinese: 结果优选辅料为糖粉和糊精。

sentences.english: Amendments are important assistant materials in the composting process.
sentences.chinese: 调理剂是堆肥过程中的重要辅料。

sentences.english: Another company plant can produce plastic parts and metal accessories products.
sentences.chinese: 公司另有分厂可生产塑料配件及金属辅料制品。

sentences.english: Xigou Limestone Mine are JISCO group flux smelting base accessories.
sentences.chinese: 西沟石灰石矿是酒钢集团的冶炼熔剂辅料基地。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic action of soybean phospholipid in Silybin Capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价益肝灵胶囊中辅料大豆磷脂的治疗作用。

definition: ingredients (in a cooking recipe)/to mix materials according to directions
